title: appendix33
text: Appendix 3 İstanbul, November 29, 1999 Mr. Ahmet Evin Mr. Hilmi Çelik Mr. Kemal İnan Mr. Muhittin Oral Ms. Münire Arıkol Ref.: Our meeting dated November 3, 1999 The internal and external correspondence of the University should be carried out in compliance with the guidelines and rules specified in The Sabancı University Institutional Identity Guide and the supplementary Instruction Letter On Correspondence Standards. Please do not hesitate to contact me should you need any clarifications. Yours sincerely, Ahmet Özen Counselor cc: Mr. Mehmet Kulan
